name: Classic South End Brownstone Studio-Prime Location
description:
This building is uniquely positioned at the intersection of two great neighborhoods: the Back Bay and the South End. One can enjoy all the high end shopping, restaurants and tourist attractions that the Back Bay offers along with the novelties of the South End, the choice neighborhood for Boston's young families, working professionals and artists, among others, and it's known best for its many parks, funky shops and its acclaimed cafes and restaurants.

The space
This building contains sixteen furnished studio apartments, each of which is available for nightly, weekly and monthly rentals.

This unit is located in a gorgeous brownstone building in Concord Square, in Boston's historic South End neighborhood. The queen bed comfortably sleeps 1 to 2 people. The space is equipped with a full bathroom, a refrigerator, and in some cases a microwave and desk. There is a flat-screen TV in the living area with local channels.
